hero.description: Delicious liquid dietary supplement containing choline, rich multivitamin, and mineral complex. Specially formulated for children's healthy growth and development.

benefits.title: For Your Child's Healthy
benefits.description: Bravita's rich vitamin and mineral content supports children's normal growth and development.

immune.title: Immune System
immune.desc: Helps the normal function of the immune system with Vitamin C, Zinc, B6, Vitamin A, Selenium, Vitamin D, B12, Iron, and Folic Acid.

nervous.title: Nervous System
nervous.desc: Biotin, Niacin, Vitamin C, Iodine, Vitamins B1, B2, B6, and B12 contribute to the normal functioning of the nervous system.

energy.title: Energy Metabolism
energy.desc: Vitamin C, Niacin, Iron, Vitamins B2, B6, and B12 support normal energy-yielding metabolism and contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.

bone.title: Bone Development
bone.desc: Vitamin D is needed for normal growth and development of bone in children. Zinc, Vitamin K, and Manganese contribute to the maintenance of normal bones.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: Zinc, Vitamin B2, and Vitamin A contribute to the maintenance of normal vision.

heart.title: Liver & Heart
heart.desc: Choline contributes to the maintenance of normal liver function. Vitamin B1 contributes to the normal function of the heart.

product.title: Delicious and
product.description: Delicious liquid formula with natural orange and vanilla flavor that children will love.

flavor.title: Natural Flavor
flavor.desc: Delicious formula with orange and vanilla flavor.

liquid.title: Liquid Formula
liquid.desc: Easy-to-swallow liquid form that children will enjoy consuming.

rich.title: Rich Content
rich.desc: Comprehensive support with more than 20 vitamins and minerals.

science.title: Scientific Formula
science.desc: Content supported by scientific research, complying with the Turkish Food Codex.

ingredients.title: Rich
ingredients.description: Nutritional values per 5 ml (1 scoop) - Nutrient Reference Value percentages (% NRV)
ingredients.nrv_desc: * NRV: Nutrient Reference Value. Turkey (The origin of the main component of the dietary supplement is different from the country of origin of the product.)

usage.title: How to
usage.warning_1: It is not a medicine. It cannot be used for the prevention or treatment of diseases.
usage.warning_2: Dietary supplements cannot replace a normal diet.
usage.warning_3: Do not exceed the recommended daily intake.
usage.warning_4: Keep out of reach of children.
usage.warning_5: Consult your doctor in case of pregnancy and breastfeeding, illness or drug use.

about.title: Generations Growing
about.description: We believe that every family's greatest dream is to see their children grow up healthy and happy. On this path, we work with all our strength to provide the most valuable support to support their healthy development and help them reach their potential.
about.science_desc: Scientific research conducted according to international standards

mission.title: For the Heroes of the Future
mission.content: A hero awaits discovery inside every child. Bravita believes that revealing this potential starts with laying a healthy foundation.

vision.title: From Turkey to the World
vision.content: As a brand born in these lands, we draw our strength from the health needs of our people. We advance with the vision of becoming a brand trusted by families worldwide.

motto.title: Source of Power
motto.content: We provide practical support to your daily diet with the motto "Growth Formula is Here" to stay fit in the hustle and bustle of modern life.

footer.tagline: Liquid Dietary Supplement Containing Multivitamin, Multimineral and Amino Acid.

cookie_consent.title: Cookie Usage
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to provide you with a better experience and analyze site traffic.

agreements.consent: I approve the <1>Preliminary Information Form</1> and <3>Distance Sales Agreement</3>.

pre_info.article_1_title: 1) Name, quantity, sales price including VAT, payment method and basic characteristics of the goods or services subject to the contract
pre_info.payment_desc: Information on how many installments the order total will be paid is available on the order summary page. Your bank may organize campaigns and apply a number of installments higher than the number of installments you selected, and services such as installment postponement may be offered. Such campaigns are at the initiative of your bank and information about campaigns is given on our pages if it is within the knowledge of our company. Starting from the account cut-off date of your credit card, the order total will be divided by the number of installments and reflected on your credit card summary by your bank. The bank may not distribute the installment amounts equally to the months by taking into account the fractional differences. The creation of your detailed payment plan is at the initiative of your bank.
pre_info.article_2_text: 2) Packaging, shipping and delivery costs are covered by the BUYER. The shipping fee is 0.00 -TL and the shipping price is added to the total order amount. It is not included in the product price. Delivery will be made by hand to the BUYER's address specified above via the contracted cargo company. Even if the BUYER is not present at the address at the time of delivery, our Company will be deemed to have fulfilled its performance completely and completely. Therefore, the SELLER is not responsible for the damages and expenses arising from the BUYER's late delivery and/or non-delivery of the product. The SELLER is responsible for delivering the product subject to the contract intact, complete, in accordance with the qualifications specified in the order and with warranty documents and user manuals, if any.
pre_info.article_3_text: 3) The product will be delivered within 30 days at the latest from the contract date. All responsibility belongs to the SELLER until the delivery of the product.
pre_info.article_4_text: 4) The consumer (BUYER) has the right to withdraw from this Distance Sales Agreement within 14 (fourteen) days without giving any reason and without paying any penal clause. The CONSUMER is obliged to return the goods subject to the contract to the seller or the carrier determined by the seller within 10 days from the date on which he uses his right of withdrawal. The withdrawal period starts on the day the contract is established in contracts regarding service performance; in contracts regarding the delivery of goods, it starts on the day the consumer or the third party determined by the consumer receives the goods. However, the consumer can also use the right of withdrawal within the period from the establishment of the contract to the delivery of the goods.
pre_info.article_4_list_a: a) For goods that are the subject of a single order and delivered separately, the day the consumer or the third party determined by the consumer receives the last good,
pre_info.article_4_list_b: b) For goods consisting of more than one part, the day the consumer or the third party determined by the consumer receives the last part,
pre_info.article_4_list_c: c) In contracts where the regular delivery of the goods takes place for a certain period of time, the day the consumer or the third party determined by the consumer receives the first good is taken as a basis.
pre_info.article_4_link: You can notify your withdrawal request via the easy return option on your personal membership page on www.hepsiburada.com before the withdrawal period expires.
pre_info.exceptions_title: The consumer cannot use the right of withdrawal in the following contracts:
exceptions_list: a) Contracts for goods or services whose prices vary depending on fluctuations in the financial markets and are not under the control of the SELLER or the provider.
b) Contracts for goods prepared in line with the consumer's wishes or personal needs.
c) Contracts for the delivery of perishable goods or goods whose expiration date may pass.
d) Contracts for the delivery of goods whose protective elements such as packaging, tape, seal, package generally are opened after delivery; those whose return is not suitable for health and hygiene.
e) Contracts for goods that are mixed with other products after delivery and cannot be separated due to their nature.

f) Contracts for books, digital content and computer consumables offered in the material environment if the protective elements such as packaging, tape, seal, package are opened after the delivery of the goods.
g) Contracts for the delivery of periodicals such as newspapers and magazines, excluding those provided under the subscription contract.

h) Contracts for the evaluation of leisure time for accommodation, transportation of goods, car rental, food and beverage supply and entertainment or recreation purposes, provided that they must be done on a specific date or period.
i) Contracts for services performed instantly in the electronic environment or intangible goods delivered instantly to the consumer.
j) Contracts for services started to be performed with the approval of the consumer before the withdrawal period expires.
pre_info.article_5_text: 5) If the consumer purchases any digital content, information regarding the technical protection measures that will affect the functionality of the digital content and the hardware or software with which the digital content works, which the SELLER knows or is reasonably expected to know, is included in the promotional content on the page where the purchased product is offered for sale.
pre_info.article_6_text: 6) Consumer complaints and objections: If you have a complaint about your order and/or the product subject to your order and/or any issue related to your order, you can forward your complaints to the SELLER via the contact information specified above. In disputes arising from this contract; Turkish Courts are authorized; Turkish Law is the applicable law.
pre_info.article_7_text: 7) The Preliminary Information Form and the Distance Sales Agreement are preliminary protocols for products whose sale requires official transactions to be carried out before official authorities in accordance with relevant legislation.
pre_info.article_8_text: 8) The Consumer accepts, declares and undertakes that benefitting from the campaign offered under the name "bring old-take new" on the Website depends on fulfilling the campaign conditions fully and on time.

sales_agreement.article_2_text: The subject of this contract is the determination of the rights and obligations of the parties in accordance with the provisions of the Law on the Protection of the Consumer No. 6502 regarding the sale and delivery of the product whose qualifications and sales price are specified below, which the CONSUMER has ordered electronically from the website.
sales_agreement.article_3_title: ARTICLE 3- INFORMATION ABOUT THE PRODUCT SUBJECT TO THE CONTRACT, PAYMENT AND DELIVERY
sales_agreement.article_3_1_text: 3.1- Name, quantity, sales price including VAT, payment method and basic characteristics of the goods or services subject to the contact
sales_agreement.article_3_2_text: 3.2- Payment Method : {{method}}. Information on how many installments the order total will be paid is available on the order summary page.
sales_agreement.article_3_3_text: 3.3- Since forward sales are made only with credit cards belonging to Banks, the CONSUMER accepts that he/she will also confirm the relevant interest rates and default interest information from his/her bank.
sales_agreement.article_3_4_text: In cases where the CONSUMER exercises his/her right of withdrawal or if the product subject to the order cannot be supplied for various reasons or if it is decided to refund the price to the CONSUMER by the decisions of the arbitral tribunal, the return procedure regarding payment options is specified below:
sales_agreement.article_3_4_a: a) Return Procedure in Credit Card Payment Options: The Bank makes the refund to the CONSUMER in installments.
sales_agreement.article_3_4_b: b) Return Procedure in Money Order/EFT Payment Options: The refund will be made in the form of Money Order and EFT to the account specified by the CONSUMER.
sales_agreement.shipping_cost_text: Packaging, shipping and delivery costs are covered by the CONSUMER. The shipping fee is 0.00 -TL and the shipping price is added to the total order amount.
sales_agreement.article_4_text: The CONSUMER has the right to withdraw from this Distance Sales Agreement signed with the SELLER within 14 (fourteen) days without giving any reason and without paying any penal clause. The CONSUMER is obliged to return the goods subject to the contract to the seller or the carrier determined by the seller within 10 days from the date on which he uses his right of withdrawal.
sales_agreement.article_5_1: 5.1- The CONSUMER declares that he/she has read the preliminary information regarding the product subject to the contract on the website and is informed and gives the necessary confirmation electronically.
sales_agreement.article_5_2: 5.2- The product will be delivered within 30 days at the latest from the contract date.
sales_agreement.article_5_3: 5.3- If the product subject to the contract is to be delivered to a person/organization other than the CONSUMER, the SELLER cannot be held responsible if the person/organization to be delivered does not accept the delivery.
sales_agreement.article_5_4: 5.4- The SELLER is responsible for delivering the product subject to the contract intact, complete, in accordance with the qualifications specified in the order and with warranty documents and user manuals, if any.
sales_agreement.article_6_text_1: In disputes arising from this contract; Turkish Courts are authorized; Turkish Law is the applicable law. Consumer Arbitration Committees in the Province or District generally where the Consumer resides are authorized for disputes up to the value declared by the Ministry of Trade every year valid within the borders of the Republic of Turkey.
sales_agreement.article_6_text_2: In case the order is realized, the CONSUMER is deemed to have accepted all the terms of this contract.
